title: 3D Interactive Trader Education Website

requirements.text: Design and implement a visually immersive 3D hero environment using Three.js / React Three Fiber as the landing experience. The scene should feature a dark, futuristic trading floor aesthetic with floating charts, candlestick formations, and animated particle systems. Typography should use a clean, modern font with gold/amber accent colors on a near-black background.

quotes: create a 3d website which helps traders learn concepts

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders a 3D interactive scene with visible candlestick or chart elements
Scene uses gold/amber accent colors on a dark background
Animated particles or floating elements are present in the scene
Page is responsive and performs smoothly

requirements.text: Create a 3D interactive module card navigation system on the homepage. Display four learning module cards in a 3D carousel or grid — SMT (Smart Money Technique), ICT (Inner Circle Trader), Price Action, and Indicators. Each card should float in 3D space with hover animations and transition effects when selected.
acceptanceCriteria: Four module cards are visible: SMT, ICT, Price Action, Indicators
Cards have 3D hover/tilt animations
Clicking a card navigates to that module's detail page
Cards display module title, a short tagline, and an icon or visual

requirements.text: Build an SMT (Smart Money Technique) learning module page. Include sections covering: definition and origin of SMT, core principles (liquidity sweeps, institutional order flow, displacement), visual diagram illustrations embedded as interactive 3D or 2D annotated charts, and a concept summary card. Use static educational content.
acceptanceCriteria: SMT module page is accessible from the homepage card
Page contains at minimum 3 educational sections on SMT concepts
At least one visual/diagram is rendered to illustrate SMT logic
A summary or key takeaways section is present

requirements.text: Build an ICT (Inner Circle Trader) learning module page. Include sections covering: what ICT methodology is, core concepts (order blocks, fair value gaps, market structure, kill zones, optimal trade entry), annotated visual examples, and a summary. Use static educational content.
acceptanceCriteria: ICT module page is accessible from the homepage card
Page covers at minimum: order blocks, fair value gaps, market structure, kill zones
Visual examples or diagrams illustrate each concept
Navigation back to homepage is available

requirements.text: Build a Price Action learning module page. Include sections on: candlestick patterns (pin bar, engulfing, doji), support and resistance, trend identification, and breakout patterns. Include 3D or stylized 2D animated candlestick chart visualizations rendered with Three.js or CSS/SVG. Use static educational content.
acceptanceCriteria: Price Action module page is accessible from the homepage card
At least 4 candlestick pattern types are explained
Animated or interactive chart visualization is present
Support/resistance and trend content is included

requirements.text: Build a Technical Indicators learning module page. Include sections on commonly used indicators: Moving Averages (SMA/EMA), RSI (Relative Strength Index), MACD, Bollinger Bands, and Volume. Each indicator should have a brief explanation, how to read it, and a visual chart mockup rendered using Three.js or SVG. Use static educational content.
acceptanceCriteria: Indicators module page is accessible from the homepage card
At minimum 5 indicators are covered: MA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, Volume
Each indicator includes a chart or visual mockup
Practical reading tips are included for each

requirements.text: Implement a persistent navigation bar that displays the app name/logo and links to each of the four learning modules. The nav should be semi-transparent with a glass-morphism effect to complement the dark 3D aesthetic.
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar is visible on all pages
Navbar contains links to: Home, SMT, ICT, Price Action, Indicators
Glass-morphism or translucent dark styling is applied
Active link is visually highlighted

requirements.text: Implement a backend data store in Motoko that persists progress tracking per module. Store a list of module IDs and a boolean completion status for each. Expose query and update calls to mark a module as completed and retrieve all module completion statuses.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores completion status for at least 4 modules (smt, ict, priceAction, indicators)
getProgress query returns all module statuses
markComplete update call sets a module as completed
Data persists across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Display module completion progress on the homepage. Show a progress indicator (e.g., a glowing progress ring or bar) for each module card based on the backend completion state. Allow users to mark modules complete from within each module page.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage shows visual progress state per module card
Completed modules show a distinct visual state (e.g., glowing ring, checkmark)
Each module page has a 'Mark as Complete' button
Completion state is fetched from the backend on load

constraints: All 3D rendering must use Three.js with React Three Fiber — no external 3D engines
All educational content is static (no external API calls for content)
Backend logic must remain in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: No live market data feeds or real-time price charts
No user authentication or login system
No community forums, chat, or social features
No quizzes, grading, or certification system in this version

required: Dark futuristic trading hero background with glowing candlestick chart lines and grid on a deep black background (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Stylized gold candlestick pattern illustration showing bullish engulfing candle on dark background (candlestick-hero.dim_800x400.png)
Abstract glowing geometric logo mark for TraderVerse Academy — angular and sharp design in gold and white on transparent background (logo-mark.dim_256x256.png)
